name: garudhiya-website
description: Garudhiya personal website with performance optimizations

scripts.minify:css: npx clean-css-cli -o css/style.min.css css/style.css && npx clean-css-cli -o css/admin.min.css css/admin.css
scripts.minify:js: npx terser js/script.js -o js/script.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/dark-mode.js -o js/dark-mode.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/blog.js -o js/blog.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/products.js -o js/products.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/blog-post.js -o js/blog-post.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/global-search.js -o js/global-search.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:firebase: npx terser js/firebase-db.js -o js/firebase-db.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/firebase-storage.js -o js/firebase-storage.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:admin: npx terser js/admin-dashboard-firebase.js -o js/admin-dashboard-firebase.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/admin-comments.js -o js/admin-comments.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/admin-auth.js -o js/admin-auth.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:utils: npx terser js/page-transitions.js -o js/page-transitions.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/toast.js -o js/toast.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/scroll-animations.js -o js/scroll-animations.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/keyboard-shortcuts.js -o js/keyboard-shortcuts.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/confirm-dialog.js -o js/confirm-dialog.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/image-lightbox.js -o js/image-lightbox.min.js -c -m && npx terser js/popular-posts.js -o js/popular-posts.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:all: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:firebase && npm run minify:admin && npm run minify:utils
